bug.author: tconkling
bug.description:
From Danny: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/709022/70193869-63f34380-16b5-11ea-8af9-2cc6c8e66a88.png></denchmark-link>
If a custom server URL is specified, it's shown correctly in the app snapshot text, but the actual link is incorrect.

comments.comment:
The issue turned out to be that the [s3] url=... config entry was missing the http:// prefix. The config looked like this: <denchmark-code>[s3] url="people.yelpcorp.com/~dqn/st" # <-- wrong </denchmark-code>
instead of this: <denchmark-code>[s3] url="https://people.yelpcorp.com/~dqn/st" </denchmark-code>
We should probably validate the URL at config loading time?
